treatment-md.title: Machaerilaemus laticorpus Carriker 1903
treatment-md.article-title: Chewing lice (Phthiraptera) from typical antbirds and ground antbirds (Passeriformes: Thamnophilidae, Formicariidae) from Costa Rica, with descriptions of three new species of the genera Formicaphagus and Myrsidea
